skill.frontend: I design and optimize UI/UX with a focus on user experience.
skill.backend: I understand backend architecture and have experience with API integration and server setup.

description.data1: Beyond simply implementing features, I strive to make services more intuitive and user-friendly.
description.data2: Thoughtful UI/UX design—considering responsive web design, accessibility, and performance—determines the overall service quality.
description.data3: I focus on reducing unnecessary loading times and crafting smooth animations and interactions for an improved user experience.

description.data1: Problems may seem simple at first, but re-evaluating them can lead to better solutions.
description.data2: I don’t just build UI/UX—I apply an optimized, maintainable approach that ensures long-term efficiency.
description.data3: By using a structured and data-driven approach, I improve both usability and performance.

description.data1: It is important to collaborate with designers, backend developers, and QA engineers to achieve better results.
description.data2: I value a culture of growth through code reviews and knowledge sharing with my team.
description.data3: To ensure smooth collaboration, I apply Git Flow for version control, develop based on API documentation, and maintain consistent coding conventions.
